comment.body: Ah, those troll companies suing people who download it rather than the people who seed it. I mean, it could be argued that uploading for 20 seconds is literally the time required for you to turn off the torrent after it completed so that's really dumb to sue over that.
hmm interesting I didn't know that, tho since the same console is in my terminal window I used to start zeronet from, I fail to see what the point of this is tbh
@caryoscelus: true, it does show a lot more, but it scrolls by so fast it might as well be useless xD
so, install it? unless you don't want it?
@Moor: but does @caryoscelus have a loicense to pay loisences?
